text: (ai rasool) unamen se kuchh to aise bhee hain jo tumhen khairaat (kee taqaseem) mein (khvaah ma khvaah) ilzaam dete hain phir agar uname se kuchh (maaqool miqadaar(hissa)) de diya gaya to khush ho gae aur agar unakee marzee ke muvaaphiq usamen se unhen kuchh nahin diya gaya to bas phauran hee bigad baithe
